Html:
Hello all, i am using greatmaps to display a map for truck routes, we would like to find a way to include real time or playback into the maps that way we have a better view of the trucks and can better our services.

my question is, is there anything in play right now that will allow GMap to create real time data or playback?

thanks for your time.
add timer and change marker position according to track values, check the demo for live data visualization
thank you, but i am not seeing said demo
